metadata.title: CVE-2024-3262 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Information exposure vulnerability in RT software affecting version 4.4.1.This vulnerability allows an attacker with local access to the device toretrieve sensitive information about the application, such as vulnerabilitytickets, because the application stores the information in the browsercache, leading to information exposure despite session termination.

criterions.comment: request-tracker4 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
